alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Hardin; Logan; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 11:48AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SHOWER WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN SHELBY, NORTHERN LOGAN, EAST CENTRAL AUGLAIZE AND SOUTHWESTERN HARDIN COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM EDT... At 1148 AM EDT, a shower was located near Anna, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Anna, Jackson Center, Russells Point, Botkins, Lakeview, Waynesfield, Belle Center, Chippewa Park, Northwood, Roundhead, Rushsylvania, Mcguffey, Huntsville, Port Jefferson, Fryburg, Montra, Maplewood, Bloom Center and Big Springs. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 94 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
